thread.title: A Trump supporter was just knocked unconscious at Portland Intl. Airport protest of immigration EO #PDX
thread.title_full: A Trump supporter was just knocked unconscious at Portland Intl. Airport protest of immigration EO #PDX

author: Greg P.
title: A Trump supporter was just knocked unconscious at Portland Intl. Airport protest of immigration EO #PDX
text:
A Trump supporter was just knocked unconscious at Portland Intl. Airport protest of immigration EO #PDX Posted at 8:59 pm on January 29, 2017 by Greg P. 
Breaking news out of Portland where a Trump supporter was just knocked unconscious after a fight broke out between pro- and anti-Trump forces at a protest at Portland International Airport: Pro Trump supporter knocked unconscious at #PDX protest pic.twitter.com/bASmieQjJU 
— Andrew Dymburt (@DymburtNews) January 30, 2017 A “Bible Believers” Trump preacher is in the ground, hurt. A Reverend told me he saw them punch protesters earlier #PDXProtest #muslimban pic.twitter.com/OimM2xwPaf 
— doug brown (@dougbrown8) January 30, 2017 
The Trump supporters may have started the altercation: Witnesses told me the “Bible Believers” Trump preacher was punched in the head after grabbing a guy’s throat #PDXProtest #MuslimBan 
— doug brown (@dougbrown8) January 30, 2017 Rev. Dr. Chuck Currie, here for the protest, said he saw the Bible Believers/Trump preachers punching people, said the PPB did nothing 
— doug brown (@dougbrown8) January 30, 2017 
The injured Trump supporter was evacuated by the police: Pro Trump supporter who was knocked out, carried away by Police. Looks like all Pro-Trump people are gone. pic.twitter.com/VnT1RsmDV9 
— Andrew Dymburt (@DymburtNews) January 30, 2017 Riot cops carried the hurt pro-trump “bible believers” preacher to an elevator #PDXProtest #muslimban pic.twitter.com/5owGjcl8At 
— doug brown (@dougbrown8) January 30, 2017 
Several people were reportedly shot by rubber bullets: Two people were shot with rubber bullets by riot cops in the airport during the preacher-punching fracas. Here’s one #PDXProtest #Muslimban pic.twitter.com/kTTz5uDd2b 
— doug brown (@dougbrown8) January 30, 2017 No violence should have occurred. @PortlandPolice could have intervened early to prevent. #MuslimBan https://t.co/cYmazEVo7b @tedwheeler 
— Rev.Dr. Chuck Currie (@RevChuckCurrie) January 30, 2017 
Here’s video of the “preachers” from before the fight: Oh man, those pro-Trump preachers are here on the second level, where march is going #PDXProtest #muslimban pic.twitter.com/Be8oKNmJJm 
— doug brown (@dougbrown8) January 30, 2017 
So, how did the fight really start? Trending
